author: mattmann
msg: - fix bug in metadata reading (skip 2 args per metadata read)

author: mattmann
msg: - add method for copying single Task and single Condition
- utilize these methods in the WorkflowRepository
- move over the Workflow copying to the Repository, not the Engine. This way, the WorklowRepository always returns a new copy of a
Workflow when asked to retrieve one. This way, the WorkflowEngine never has to worry about stepping on another Workflows toes when
executing a Workflow. So, for each WorkflowInstance, we have a fresh copy of all the Tasks and Conditions and place within the Workflow
which is the way that it should be.

author: mattmann
msg: - update MemoryWorkflowEngine to create a copy of each Workflow that it creates a Workflow Instance from. Utilize the new methods
- add object copy methods that copy Workflows, Tasks and Conditions from their originals
- update TestWorkflowRepository unit test to reflect the fact that there are now 3 workflows in the example set

author: mattmann
msg: - update example xml files for XML Workflows

author: mattmann
msg: - Add sample conditions and tasks for simulating a long time to do something in the examples package
